filters

Class AdvancedFilters

  • java.lang.Object
    • filters.AdvancedFilters
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlbumFilters, DanceFilters, PublicationFilters, RecordingFilters

    public abstract class AdvancedFilters
extends java.lang.Object
    Advanced Filters is the abstract superclass containing shared information and behaviors from Album Filters, Dance Filters, Publication Filters, and Recording Filters
    Author:
    lisaketcham
